channel.title: Who Here Performs Live? Anything to Share?
channel.description:
This account represents two people (Saydyy Kuo & Oscar) from the ethno-fusion group UDAGAN. We’ve been using Auxy a bit more in our creative process recently.
Both our backgrounds are in performance. Curious to hear about other Auxy user’s involvement with performing!
Saydyy Kuo is a native performer of Ethno-Folk from the North Siberian Republic Of Sakha. Here she’s performing with folk group ‘Ayarkhaan’: https://youtu.be/vfF28Xd5xw0
Oscar has done a lot of work as a session bass player, playing live with and recording with many artists in the UK & Ireland. This is him performing in this role in Northwest UK (playing bass): https://youtu.be/bRW5UKQGamA
Together we’re working on our collaborative project UDAGAN (http://UDAGANuniverse.com). There are some clips from our most recent performance together in this Twitter moment: https://twitter.com/udaganuniverse/status/887341718105989122
What live stuff are other people doing? Any links to share?

item.title: Who Here Performs Live? Anything to Share?
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
I’m a DJ, so I’m used to performing live, and I’ve started to do do Live PA (Live Production Act) which is basically being a one man band.

I have a question, though.

How’re you two performing, @UDGN ?
Are you guys a straight band, or is there some forms of Live PA in your set?

If it be the latter, Auxy could be a nice piece of gear to use, in combination with Ableton Live and Ableton Link, and MIDI clock out of Live into some synths and samplers/drum machines.

Read full topic
item.source: Who Here Performs Live? Anything to Share?

Frick it, stage fright.

item.title: Who Here Performs Live? Anything to Share?
item.dc:creator: Southborne
item.description:
facebook.com

The Fergusons

Big thanks to Festivale for having us on the main stage. It was such a blast. Posting one of our more chilled songs, a favourite by Stevie Ray Vaughan....Riviera Paradise.

facebook.com

The Fergusons

Here's a better res video of The Fergusons playing recently as requested. (Switch on HD for better video quality). Thanks to everyone for all the support! Be sure to check out our page.

item.title: Who Here Performs Live? Anything to Share?
item.dc:creator: UDGN
item.description:
This account represents two people (Saydyy Kuo & Oscar) from the ethno-fusion group UDAGAN. We’ve been using Auxy a bit more in our creative process recently.

Both our backgrounds are in performance. Curious to hear about other Auxy user’s involvement with performing!

Saydyy Kuo is a native performer of Ethno-Folk from the North Siberian Republic Of Sakha. Here she’s performing with folk group ‘Ayarkhaan’:

https://www.youtube.com/embed/vfF28Xd5xw0

Oscar has done a lot of work as a session bass player, playing live with and recording with many artists in the UK & Ireland. This is him performing in this role in Northwest UK (playing bass):

https://www.youtube.com/embed/bRW5UKQGamA

Together we’re working on our collaborative project UDAGAN (http://UDAGANuniverse.com). There are some clips from our most recent performance together in this Twitter moment:
https://twitter.com/udaganuniverse/status/887341718105989122

What live stuff are other people doing? Any links to share?
